snippet.title: Let's Play Chef - Developer's Commentary
snippet.description:
Chef is a game that I designed in October 2014. It's an interactive chef cooking simulation game that uses stopmotion animation.

You play as chef, a happy-go-lucky cook who is bombarded by an angry customer, and you have to decide what you want to do for the customer. Maybe you should be professioinal and take his order, or maybe you can accidentally slip a few drops of the rat poison that's behind the hot sauce, or perhaps just make his soup extremely disgusting. It's up to you!

Check out and play Chef! There's many different endings to choose from and hope you guys have fun!

Also, yes I did do the voice work, all of it. XD

Link to Chef:
http://gamejolt.com/games/other/chef/35694/

Chef elected as one of the best PC games of the week by PCGamer!
http://www.pcgamer.com/the-best-free-games-of-the-week-49/
